caption: Itâ€™s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. A man gets on a helicopter and tries to run away. Another man runs after him and catches the rope that swings down from the helicopter. He gradually climbs on the rope. At the same time., a man and a woman are trying to do something, they look nervous and cross, and they even start an argument. The man finally climbs into a helicopter and kills the driver. He uses the helicopter to fight against another one. Finally, the two helicopters all lose control and crash towards the ground.
